website_summaries.verdict: Although you only get 3 oz., this sunscreen has skin-loving qualities, including excellent sun protection and a formula that's not likely to irritate skin.
pros: Stands up to moisture, and can last up to 80 minutes of fun in the water before needing to reapply
Oil-free formula doesn't feel greasy or sticky on the skin
No parabens or fragrance makes it suitable for sensitive skin
cons: Small tube means you will likely run out quickly, which could get costly

customer_reviews.title: Price more than doubled in 6 months! Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: It's too bad that Elta MD more than doubled the price of this product in less than 6 months. My dermatologist recommended this for our family's fair skin and it worked great until they jacked the price from $19.95 to $47.50 for ONLY 7 oz.!!!! I went to reorder on Amazon and was in shock. Good bye Elta MD. It was nice when the middle class could afford to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Time

customer_reviews.title: Warning
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used any sunscreen before so this is my first product to protect my skin. I see a lots of reviews about this and decide to give it a try. For few days using this my skin around the chin area got rash and itchy. I’m very worried b/c my skin is kinda sensitive and will turn out very bad. I don’t say this product is bad but for who’s looking for a sunscreen and you never try it please be careful find a sample first before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Twee

customer_reviews.title: Everyday sunscreen great for face and neck
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleasantly surprised by this. I live in San Diego, and the cross we bear living in paradise is wearing sunscreen every day. I've been wearing the Elta spf 45 for faces, which I like. But, I found it made my skin a little whitish, and as it didn't have staying power, I wasn't thrilled with that tradeoff. I hesitated to buy this, but it's working well as a face sunscreen. It starts off greasy-ish on your skin, but that goes away after a bit. I find that if I dust on just bit of face powder (I hate wearing makeup), it looks really natural. It has good coverage.
customer_reviews.author: MMc

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Even though it's a little greasy well after application, this UV Sport formula protects like no other I've ever used. I tried switching to the non-greasy UV Shield and got a tan with that one. Only UV Sport can protect you for hours, and even though my dermatologist said to reapply every 2 hours, there have been sweltering hot summer days where I was outside gardening or working and never reapplied all day, and this stuff still protected me. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ParisSunset

customer_reviews.title: Needed good sun screen to use while jogging
customer_reviews.text: Needed good sun screen to use while jogging. I sweat a lot from my forehead and needed something that would come off and sting my eyes. This product has been awesome. Dosnt come off. It dosnt have that gross sun screen smell. I have rosacea which makes my face very sensitive to most products. This sunscreen is the only brand I’d use.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Rivera

customer_reviews.title: The sunscreen doesn't give off a white cast like most others which is nice
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin. I've been using this for about 1 year on and off.The sunscreen doesn't give off a white cast like most others which is nice, however, it does leave my skin looking very greasy. I have also had a handful of incidents where my face started burning like crazy after I started to sweat and I had to immediately go wash my face and pat it with cold cloths to relieve the burning sensation. The smell is not good either. I work with children and they've asked me "what that smell is" every time I wear it on my body and face.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Angus Fannypants

customer_reviews.title: Works better than anything else I've ever tried.
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommended I use this sun block because I am super pale and I got REALLY burned at the beach a few years back. I do a lot of theme parking here in Orlando, and using this sunblock (applying just once in the morning), I never burn. I will notice a little darkening after a full day, but it's barely noticeable. I highly recommend this sunblock. (Picture included to show exactly how pale I am)
customer_reviews.author: Erica Dean L

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using EltaMD since the summer and very pleased with it. It came as a recommendation from my Dermatologist. She explained the benefits of the ingredients that this has such as the Zinc Oxide. This will give you proper protection from the sun. I have been using it while active and sweaty and not having any issue with burning in my eyes. It smells good and does not have a greasy feel to it. I highly recommend this sunscreen if you want to properly protect your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sid Scheck

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: My holy grail of sunscreens! This delivers everything I need in a sunscreen. It does not stain clothing. It is fragrance-free. It does not irritate my super-sensitive skin. It disappears on my skin, no heavy, white grease. Blends right in. It stays on. I am a very active person who is frequently outdoors and I sweat a LOT. I am also a very pale redhead and everyone knows what happens to redheads in the sun. I can't say enough good things about this stuff, other than the price tag is pretty hefty, but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: M G Scott

customer_reviews.title: we fortunately landed on EltaMD SPF 50
customer_reviews.text: My son is a year-round swimmer and practices in the afternoon sun for more than 2 hours a day, in addition to 4 morning practices and frequent weekend swim meets. Naturally, sunscreen is a big part of his daily routine. After using and ditching many, many sunscreens over the years, we fortunately landed on EltaMD SPF 50. This is his favorite, and he would not use any other brands. The consistency allows it to spread easily. It's slightly oily and white when applied, but after a few minutes it absorbs well, no longer white or oily. It keeps him from sun burn especially during swim meets where he is in the sun for a whole day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best summer sunscreen and I won’t go to the beach without it
customer_reviews.text: I don’t trust anything else on my face during the summer. I used to use the Chinese biore ++++ sunblock but I almost felt like it was bleaching my skin a little? I was unnaturally pale and the rest of my body was tan. But man that stuff WORKS and doesn’t come off so if that’s what you need, check that out. With this, I don’t get burned but i also don’t look like a ghost in the summer. Just apply regularly. I personally prefer it to the biore.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Not hypoallergenic
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely allergic to this sport/water resistant Elta Sunscreen, whereas I can use the Elta UV clear facial sunscreen without a problem. Be away that water-resistant adds chemicals that could burn/itch your skin. After the 2nd day using this I realized that it was causing incredible itching, so I stopped using it. For the next 2 weeks my skin felt like it had been burnt. Not red, but it felt scaly. After a couple of weeks that scaly skin was gone ane I feel fine. But using this ruined my Bermuda trip. I was super itchy and afraid to go in the sun at all with my thrashed skin.
customer_reviews.author: BLU

customer_reviews.title: Acne Free!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using his sunscreen for years now, my dermatologist and esthetician both recommended this line of products and I love them. The sun screen doesn’t smell as strong as most sun screens and it doesn’t feel heavy on the face. It’s very light and if you suffer from acne like I do then this is the right one for you, I use the sport because I feel it keeps my face protected for longer without re-application. The best part is that it doesn’t clog your pores. I wear this on a daily basis and my skin appearance has improved over all.
customer_reviews.author: Perla

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I had an allergic reaction to this sunscreen. I bought this in the summer before my trip to the beech. My face was burning and itching horribly. I Thought it was from the sun and the sea water irritation. When I used this cream again a few weeks ago on my face and started feeling the same sensations I realized that this cream is causing a reaction. Unfortunately I couldn’t return it because Amazon said it is more than a month since the purchase. Unfortunately it didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Elham

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a rash
customer_reviews.text: While this may work well for some/most people, I had an allergic reaction in Hawaii when I tried it. Wound up with a red, itchy rash everyone I had put the sunscreen. I had to stop using it, take benadryl and apply an antihistamine cream while I waited a good 24-48 hours for it to go away. Then I had to buy a different sunscreen. So sad because it's crazy expensive. Patch tested it once more and had same reaction. So, this is clearly not an allergy-free sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Although this may work fine for some people
customer_reviews.text: Although this may work fine for some people, I ended up with a severe allergic reaction which required a trip to the emergency room. Every surface that had this sunscreen on, developed a burning rash that peeled afterwards. I have used the tinted facial EltaMD without problems. The ingredients are different.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Larson

customer_reviews.title: Great for sports but no good for swimming.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very expensive sunscreen and it is sold at my dermatologist office so I wanted to love it and see it work but sadly my red head burnt wearing it. I think it’s more of a sport sunscreen but I’m not happy with it for swimming. It goes on greasy so it’s easy to spread, does not ghost and it sinks in very well with a non-greasy feel after 20 minutes. It does not run in her eyes either.
customer_reviews.author: Tangled mess

customer_reviews.title: Oil free??!
customer_reviews.text: I hated this sunscreen. I’m suspicious that I received one that was either a fake or possibly expired. I’ve seen one of my favorite youtubers (Dr Dray) use this sunscreen and it looks like it comes out slightly thick, and soaks into the skin pretty well. But the one I received was watery and made my face look wet ALL DAY. It never dried down, and was slippery and slimey. I threw it out after trying for about a week. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Alika

customer_reviews.title: Get it! What are you waiting for?
customer_reviews.text: I have used EltaMD sunscreen products for many years and been happy with the sun protection they offer! I have still have problems with pores clogging, but NOT with EltaMD sunscreens. The SPF 50 has a slight "sun lotion" smell when first applied, but dissipates fairly quickly (and really more in your "space" rather than near by people smelling it). This lotion applys without streaks, doesn't feel sticky, doesn't stain clothes and keeps me safe on a sunny day. I haven't tested the water-resistant portion ... but their other products with the same claim have been stellar in protection. If course you still need to reapply according to their instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but makes your face shiny
customer_reviews.text: I am of the Pale People and both of my parents have been treated for multiple skin cancers. I wear sunblock. In February. In Maine. The pros: no discernible scent, extremely gentle formula. I use this on my eyelids and there is no stinging or burning. It works well when I’m sailing or kayaking (re-applying as appropriate). The cons: despite being oil-free, it is very shiny on my skin. Frustrating — I’d really prefer something matte. I don’t even have oily skin, so the product’s shininess surprised me. I’m going to keep this because it is a good product as far as being gentle, but I probably won’t buy again. Five stars for quality. Minus one star for being shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Heather R.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen kept me sunburn free while I was deployed in Africa. I used it for times I was spending long hours outside and for my 5k runs. UV index was normally 10-13 during my stay there. I never once got sun burnt when using this product! And trust me, I have seen people get really bad burns out there. It also held well in the humid climate and during my long runs. I am really happy with this product and will continue to use it now that I am back home.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfey27

customer_reviews.title: Has the toxins that kill corals
customer_reviews.text: It's not the driest sunscreen but it works well and won't sting your eyes when wet, which was my main concern. However, after learning about how oxybenzone and octinoxate kill coral reefs and poison fish, I stopped using this product. The runoff from our sinks ends up in the rivers, lakes, and oceans just as much so no, I won't be doing that. I switched to mineral sunscreens with only zinc oxide and titanium dioxide that are not harmful to us, nor the sea creatures we need to thrive.
customer_reviews.author: book maven

customer_reviews.title: This sunscreen makes my face look great in photos!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing about this sunscreen, in addition to the invisible zinc oxide, is that it makes my skin look amazing in photos. Usually it’s the opposite with sunscreens that have mineral content. I would wear this even if I didn’t need a sunscreen. I put it on my face and neck daily. It’s a little pricey so I use less expensive stuff elsewhere. I also like that it is scent-free and never stings my eyes. (I don’t usually leave reviews.)
customer_reviews.author: D.D.

customer_reviews.title: great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended as a safe product by an author who wrote a book about women's fertility and egg quality. This product contains no harmful chemicals and is safe to use for women who are trying to conceive or conserve fertility in general. The product is very easy to apply and protected us from sun during our Hawaii trip. It does not feel greasy or sticky. It gives us this clean feel. Most importantly, you know it's safe to apply on your skin and your body is not absorbing harmful chemicals like other brands on the market. I highly recommend to anyone for its safety.
customer_reviews.author: mimibob

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Faulty dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: I love Elta MD! It is my go to sunscreen and I get the sport version as well as the regular one and the one with moisturizer for use on my face. The problem is with the pump in these larger size dispensers. I still have almost a full bottle of product, but the straw came off the pump and I can't even find it to try and reattach it. This is the second bottle of this design that has failed. For $50. a bottle, these dispensers should hold up better than that! Amazon, if you're listening, please help me!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love Elta MD products. I love that I get great sun protection from this without the pain of chemicals dripping into my eyes if I sweat. This is slightly thicker than the 41 SPF physical, broad spectrum, tinted Elta MD which I've used in the past. I liked the 41 SPF, but my dermatologist insisted I get the 50 and one that lasted 80 minutes instead of 40 minutes. I only wish this were tinted.
customer_reviews.author: Robinowicz

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product.
customer_reviews.text: My esthetician recommended it. I accidentally ordered the body version while shopping for the face version but I used it on my face, anyway with no breakouts. I also used it on my body and now it's all gone. I have many unfinished tubes of sunscreen that I stopped using because I broke out or the consistency wasn't comfortable. But this has now gone up $5 from the last time I bought it. I'm watching you, Elta.
customer_reviews.author: Aly-G

customer_reviews.title: Too shiny
customer_reviews.text: This product gets really great review so I wanted to try it on my search for the holy grail of sunscreens. What I like about it is that it is a mineral sunscreen that does not leave a white cast and the texture of the lotion is very nice on the skin. The big negative for me is that it is very shiny on my face. A light coating of powder does not knock it down. I have tried to wait and see if it will mattify a bit but no it does not. So I will use this on the body only. Good for hands
customer_reviews.author: Textilall

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to Chemical sunscreens.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after tearing up with some of the other chemical sunscreens. This product worked like a charm. I used it on my face and had no such issues. It spreads pretty well and a small amount will be enough for your whole face. It seemed clear enough on application to me as well. I use this just for my face to make it last. But it lasted a week at the beach for 4 people and still has plenty left. Good sun protection too; I usually peel on my nose at the very least and didn't get any of that this year.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Tatum

customer_reviews.title: oily sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: So i have been used it for a week and would like to tell that this sunscreen is not for sensative skin. I got acne after using this product. It is feels so oily, and after this sunscreen i couldnt put make up like concealer or powder. Because my skin looks so shiny and oily after using this cream. May be it is good for body, but not for face!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Nice sunscreen. Not super greasy.
customer_reviews.text: For an effective sunscreen, this isn't super greasy. To put it on a spectrum, I rate is as less greasy than Neutrogena, but more than Olay regenerist 30SPF serum. I wear this daily along with the Olay serum. They seem to work well together and have complementary ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: DesignGirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: When I asked my dermatologist what she used for sun protection, she told me EltaMD Sport Sunscreen. I ordered a tube, and like the protection it provides. I've ordered more because I don't want to run out. My orders have come quickly. I wish the sport sunscreen came in a larger size. I have also ordered the facial sunscreen from EltaMD. It, too, is an excellent product and doesn't get in my eyes the way other sunscreens do.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, but pump broke.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and use it daily on my face. Unfortunately after having it for a couple of months in storage and finally taking it out when my other one ran out, I used it for a few weeks maybe before the pump quit working like normal. Now it takes about 40-50 pumps just to get enough out to use on my face, and it is past the replacement window for a new bottle or even a pump lid. And since I did not realize this would be an issue, I had already disposed of my old bottle and pump. Haven't had this problem before either, so it is a bit disappointing, considering the price for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Washes off easily. Love this and will continue to purchase
customer_reviews.text: Stumbled across this brand while researching for SPF that won't cause acne or have a heinous smell. This meets all my expectations. Light, dissolves quickly, dries clear, can wear under makeup without greasy appearance, and is long lasting throughout the day. It doesn't clump or chunk up or leave a chalky-look if you emerge in water. If you get it on your eyelashes by mistake, it will sting a little, but that is to be expected. Washes off easily. Love this and will continue to purchase, forever!
customer_reviews.author: tiff22

customer_reviews.title: This is quality sunscreen and worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is great for two reasons: 1) it includes both chemical and physical blockers for UVA & UVB and 2) they've figured out how to get the physical blockers to rub in. This was always the problem in the past -- if you put zinc oxide (or something like it) on, you wound up with a white film Not with this product. I love it, and you don't find those two qualities in almost any mainstream sunscreens. Your skin is definitely worth the splurge.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan G.

customer_reviews.title: No.
customer_reviews.text: Holy smokes, i was a GREASE BALL while using this. this made my skin break out into cysts, black heads, Maybe this isn't great for sensitive, oily, acne prone skin
customer_reviews.author: ForTheLoveOfPugsTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Won’t use anything besides EltaMD sunscreens
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand of sunscreen for several years and buy repeatedly! I have very sensitive skin (fair complexion & red Hair). I have no irritation or negative reactions to the ingredients in the EltaMD products. Coverage and sun protection is great and I re-apply after approx 90 mins of exposure. Their products for “sports”, the ones that are resistant to perspiration are great as well. I’ve also used on my red-headed, fair skinned son for years without any skin irritations. Some of their products may appear a little Pale (not white) since they contain Zinc.
customer_reviews.author: barry owens

customer_reviews.title: I wish it smelled like the facial sunscreen lol
customer_reviews.text: The facial sunscreen they make is perfect! I only with this one smelled as good! It offers great protection, but it's still a bit greasy and smears on white like most sunscreens. It also smells chemical like most sunscreens, so for it's price range, you're better off just getting a normal sunscreen and saving your money. If this smelled like almonds/marzipan like the facial sunscreen I'd say it's worth the value, but it sadly doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Only Takes A Small Amount!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! Being a woman of color I have malasma, which is something similar to hyperpigmentation, but to me, worse. So my dermatologist being a person of color, recommended this product. I bought the regular and the sport sun screen. I prefer the sports UV because it's a little lighter In weight or thinner. All you need is a very small amount. I mix mine with my daily moisturizer, Vit C, a peptide, allow to completely dry, apply makeup if you wear it, and poof I'm out! If you have a white film you're used too much! So YEAH it works for ME! Don't forget to take it to the pool with you to reapply.
customer_reviews.author: LEENA

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my dermatologist. It's great!! We've been on 3 trips this year where we knew we would be outside in the sun a lot. We used the sunscreen, and despite being out in direct sun 8+ hours each time, we did not get sunburned at all!! All that happened is that we got a little browned. In fact, I missed a spot on my leg at a day at the beach. That spot is the only place that got sunburned. No where else where the sunscreen was put on. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Webb

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but pump won't allow my use
customer_reviews.text: I always buy an extra to have on hand so I never run out. This time when I went to get the back up it was in a pile of the lotion. I couldn't use it because the pump mechanism is broken. All of the lotion comes out the bottom. I tried unscrewing the top, but a piece of the pump makes the lotion come out in blobs and it is just too much hassle. I must be past the return/replace date because that was not an option when I looked at the order. I am hesitant to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce E. Fitch

customer_reviews.title: Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen does leave a white film. It was described as leaving no white residue. I brought ahead of time for vacation and was disappointed to find white film on my face when I used the product. I went back to Olay SPF 50 product which was out of stock at the time I needed to order this product. Olay product is 4$ cheaper too. I'm sure this is a good product and did provide sun protection. Just leaves a film. If white film is an issue, this isn't the product for you. I was not able to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: erin diedling

customer_reviews.title: Best daily sport sunscreen I’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: Rubs in really nice! I have to use sunscreen daily for health reasons and this is my favorite brand. It does sting like a mother if it gets in your eyes so I don’t use it on my forehead when working out. I use a non zinc one which doesn’t seem to bother my eyes nearly as much. Would get a five star from me if it was a bit less expensive for the size tube. But works really well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Canister defected
customer_reviews.text: This product is great protection. Not smooth to put on though. Note that the last two canisters came defected, the air pump does not work and the hole in the bottom leaks the product. Amazon did refund me but I need to use this sunscreen because of previous skin cancer , the manufacturer said it has a false bottom that must have come dislodged during shipping. I do nit believe that, I have been buying this fir 4 yrs , shipped and never had a problem. Then get 2 in 6 wks and both leak and do not work
customer_reviews.author: bp

customer_reviews.title: Greasy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this instead of the usual face shield 45 SPF I get from elta MD. For an extra 5 SPF, you end up gaining an incredible amount of greasiness. This is the greasiest sunscreen I've ever put on in my entire life. It doesn't cause breakouts and it protects very well from the sun so I'm not rating it super low, but unless you have extraordinarily dry skin I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Acne Prone Skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try something new. Just to have a more mattifying sunscreen that also didn't flake when I put on makeup over it. This is perfect. It moisturized my skin all day while providing the sunscreen I need to protect me. My makeup was super matte without having to use a lot of mattifying agents. I love this and have decided to switch from my usual brand. Besides all of that, no breakouts. NONE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: I won't use anything else. This brand covers nicely without feeling oily. No smell. Can wear under makeup. If you accidentally order the tinted one, (like I did), don't worry, it will not make a difference. My dermatologist office suggested this sunscreen. I've been using it for over 10 years. I wish I had started using it in my twenties!
customer_reviews.author: Pearlymom

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen!! It’s lightweight, non greasy, and does what it says it will do. I noticed as a suggestion for buying customers are encouraged to purchase face and spray on sunscreen but I would say save the coin. With this sunscreen in particular it is safe to use on your face (especially for MF or “Fungal Acne”) AND it has a higher SPF which means more protection from the sun. If I could buy a tub of this stuff I would. Super glad that I bought this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I would not buy again. Would be a better product if it did not apply so white. Takes a while to absorb into your skin. the biggest negative for me is that wherever you apply it, it will cause you to perspire more. Really wanted this for my face but ended up with a very sweaty face each application! Just yuck!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! Is not as light and absorbing as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Is not as light and absorbing as the SPF 45 (my favorite, but was unavailable), but is truly more of a sport sunscreen and is a little heavier. I just mix it with some moisturizer and it goes on my face/neck a bit smoother and absorbs better. I'll use it till its gone and then go back to my fave SPF 45.
customer_reviews.author: Olive Goose

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sunscreen. I use it before swim practice on my face, neck, and chest. This is a mineral-based, water-resistant sunscreen that stays on during swimming. It has never caused any stinging during application. I am fair-skinned, it goes on white but dries back completely clear on me. Doesn't get into eyes or sting. Wears well under makeup and I have never had a problem with makeup piling with this sunscreen. I haven't tried reapplying over makeup. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Travelbuff

customer_reviews.title: Broke out in a horrible rash on my neck
customer_reviews.text: Broke out in a horrible rash on my neck, chest and arms from this product. As soon as I stopped using it the rash cleared up. Only wish I had used it during the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Livengood

customer_reviews.title: Great product; not sure about authenticity
customer_reviews.text: Best sunscreen we have ever used. Recommended by dermatologist. We absolutely love it. I use the tinted for my face and non-tinted for body. However, I will say that we have heard that some Amazon products are not authentic; especially skin and hair products. So will be buying from doctor's office henceforth because we just can't be sure.
customer_reviews.author: S Kim Ehrl

customer_reviews.title: I won’t go out in the sun without this!
customer_reviews.text: I ref soccer & spend all day in the sun. I put this on before I leave the house. I also use “regular” sport (sweat-proof) sunscreen SPF 50 throughout the day & wear a hat... But using this first seems to really make a huge difference in protection from sunburn & sun damage. It’s worth the $. Goes on like a moisturizer, without feeling greasy or heavy. Wish I’d found it 10 years ago!
customer_reviews.author: BAILSNM

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a white cast and broke me out
customer_reviews.text: This definitely left a white cast. I'm white, Italian background, so I have yellow/ olive undertones and the white cast was noticeable. I also developed a big painful pimple on my face from this. The whole reason I'm using sunscreen is to help fade my hyperpigmentation from acne scars and this product just gave me a new one. I'll save it and use it on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my dermatologist sells this brand. I needed something for days when I go on bike rides or work in the yard. This probably isn't the recommendation, but I have worked a couple of times for hours outside without reapplying, and it still offered great sun protection. It goes on a bit thick, but quickly absorbs. I really like this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Allen

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the face sunscreen, the body lotion does not flake or pill. It absorbs very well and works excellent. Probably the best body sunscreen I've ever tried. Love this stuff. I can't say the same for the SPF 46 face sunscreen from same brand. It left a mess on my face of pilled/flaky lotion residue.
customer_reviews.author: Ama_customer

customer_reviews.title: How did the price change so drastically?
customer_reviews.text: Great SPF but why such a price hike? Love this for my husband who golfs regularly. I only buy physical sunblocks so I’m particular. As u can see by the photo I included that the last time I bought this it was under $30. Now it’s over $50. I will continue to purchase until I find comparable product for less money.
customer_reviews.author: SAN

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Elta sunscreen products for years, as recommended by my dermatologist. I purchased this one specifically for a pacific coast fishing trip on the Panamanian equator last month. Worked like a champ! The additional expense of Elta over cheap sunscreen is worth it by a long shot. It protects your skin from the harmful sun rays but also ensures me that I don’t end up with oily skin and complexion issues after multiple days of sun screen use.
customer_reviews.author: John W Crenshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen came dr. recommended. It doesn't flare up my son's eczema and does a great job at providing protection from the sun. The whole family uses it and not one of us has had a burn since switching to this. We are in the water all day on the weekends and only occasionally reapply. Works on face and body. Will continue to use this sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: troy_g

customer_reviews.title: Love the texture.
customer_reviews.text: After doing some research I decided to give EltaMD UV Sport Sunscreen a try. I love how light weight it is and how it goes on clear. It has no smell to it. I have been out in the sun for 8 hours strait for the past week and it has truly stand the test of time. I have not gotten a sunburn. This is my new must have.
customer_reviews.author: DanyGirl.

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Skin’s Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: The only sunscreen I’ve tried that doesn’t make my face breakout, or red because of my super sensitive skin. I use this in the morning on top of my moisturizer, but it could be used alone as a moisturizer because it is very hydrating. Looks great underneath my tinted moisturizers and BB creams and lasts through runs in Houston humidity. I recommend this product to anyone who needs a good daily sunscreen!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not fan of this product
customer_reviews.text: This is the sunscreen that little too heavy and leaves a white residue and hard to apply. I have been using many zinc sunscreen over 6 years and this is the hardest sunscreen cream to use so far. So I stopped using it and bought other product because I didn't want to look like a ghost.
customer_reviews.author: Ochi Sam

customer_reviews.title: GREAT quality inside the bottle - bottle is terrible causing a mess.
customer_reviews.text: The product inside the bottle is GREAT. The quality of the bottle, however, is terrible. For the 3rd time, a pin size hole appears at the bottom of the bottle, causing the contents to leak and make a mess. Have had to resort to putting electrical tape on the bottom of the bottle to solve. The quality of the pump is poor as well - 2 of my 4 bottles have stopped working. When selling sunscreen for $40, I'd think that the manufacture can afford spending an extra 50 cents for slightly better quality packaging. Gabe
customer_reviews.author: G. Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Second Time Pump Does not Work
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Elta MD for 20 years and love it. It is more expensive than most sunblocks but well worth it. I am 69, fair skinned and blond and love to work outside. Unfortunately, this is the second time I have purchased this product on Amazon and the pump did not work and I can't get the lotion out of the container. Now I have to hassle with returning.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: No white shine
customer_reviews.text: During quarantine we have been spending so much more time outdoors and this works so well and doesn't leave any residue what so ever. I usually have pretty sensitive skin and this hasn't elicited any reactions. I like and and want to try their other products as well.
customer_reviews.author: Don V. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Have repurchased several times
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for sensitive skin/eyes. No perfumes and doesn’t sting. Also, this works well with all of my foundations (IT Cosmetics, Sephora, Chanel and Tarte) and doesn’t pill. Coverage is very sheer (slightly pink) but doesn’t show under foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Sun PROTECTION
customer_reviews.text: I live on a tropical island where sun, wind, water-they're all part of my life and I'm constantly needing real protection for my skin. This is the one. It is zinc based but absorbs easily and lasts for up to a few hours. I use it whenever I'm planning a day at the beach or a boat ride. I use a lighter product for everyday but really, I can't live without this one.
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Elta line is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love elta md line. Been using the UV clear face and decided to try the full body sunscreen. Will continue to buy
customer_reviews.author: Hudson studio

customer_reviews.title: The best sunsceen of all time, buy it
customer_reviews.text: The best. I will never use another brand of sunscreen. I personally worship at the altar of sunsceeen, but even for my friends and family who don’t, they like this too — it helps that it doesn’t smell or feel like sunsceeen. FYI, I also use their PM moisturizer and highly recommend that as well. (However I do not personally like their AM moisturizer so I use the PM one at both times of day.)
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Everytime I used sunscreen I would get these tiny little bumps all over my skin. After 6 months of use I'm ecstatic to report that I've had no incident. There is a slight white cast but once it absorbs it goes away. I adore this product I have dry skin and it moisturizes it as well, excellent for pre make up applications
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for even the most sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many sunscreens, they should call me the sunscreen king. Almost all have irritated and/or dried out my skin. This is the holy grail. Not drying or irritating whatsoever, unlike other physical sunscreens. Makes skin look healthy and hydrated. Amazing protection, even during a hot, sweaty run outdoors. Has a mild sunscreen smell at first that goes away once absorbed. I totally forget that I have this on.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Defective packaging
customer_reviews.text: Love the product line typically. However, I’ve had this particular product not 60 days. Tried to use this yesterday and instead of dispensing from pump on top, it comes out of a very small hole on the bottom! Elta seems to be aware of a manufacturing defect, but suggested I reach out through amazon to deal with a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best sport sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best sport sunscreen I've used. It spreads on well, I don't notice a white cast as I have with other zinc sunscreens, and it doesn't feel greasy on my skin. It doesn't have an offensive smell (I can barely smell it at all). The price point is a little high, but definitely worth it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Loz

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING for tattoos
customer_reviews.text: I have a half sleeve of color tattoos. It’s amazing for protecting the color and saturation of the pigments, and keeps it from fading. It does leave a white cast on the skin and does make my tattoo look whiter, but I don’t care as long as the color is protected. Highly recommend for those who want to protect their ink!!! I also have highly sensitive skin but this didn’t break me out/irritate at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lil

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sunscreen. We went through numerous of these and will continue to buy. No white cast, not greasy, doesn't cause any breakouts for my sensitive skin, not drying. My husband also loves it. It protects him well for surfing. HG for the beach.
customer_reviews.author: KateWayTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: The best I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: THIS STUFF! I'm a really fair blonde and burn very quickly; a day at the water park was a scary idea, but I went. I bought this EltaMD sunscreen and I'm here to tell you I did not burn! I did not even get pink. I used it liberally and frequently. I always fry, but not this time. Customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: LollyPatters

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR WOMEN OF COLOR!!!
customer_reviews.text: Being a woman of color with lupus, I struggled with finding a great SPF for my face that lasts long and does not have white cast after applying.... THIS DOES THE JOB!!!! I absolutely LOVE this sunscreen for my face and so does my skin. Does not break me out and it is nice and lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great through a 4 hour round of golf...
customer_reviews.text: I was referred to this brand by another golfer pal and now it is the only Sunscreen I will use on my face. I can play a 4 hour round of golf in the Florida Sunshine (full time resident of FL) and it does a great job protecting me from the intense damage that can result from those nasty UV Rays. I am fair and thus quite susceptible to sunburn. My only thought is that I wish it were a bit more reasonable priced.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hirsh

customer_reviews.title: Good Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Having a good sunscreen is very important to me as I was diagnosed with Malignant Melanoma April of 2012. I just turned 29 so having a sunscreen which works, is invisible, and non-greasy is imperative. This is a very large sized bottle which could last me the entire summer. It does have a pump making application easy. All high SPF's are going to be thicker than SPF 30 in spray form, but with the physical barrier (as opposed to chemical barriers - yuck!) this is a great product. My dermatologist has recommended it to me from day one. Yes it is a little pricey, but if you are a cancer survivor like me, isn't it worth it?
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa R.

customer_reviews.title: Bottle got a hole!
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this at the recommendation of a dermatologist. I was surprised he would spend that much on sunscreen! I guess it worked fine, but got a hole in the bottom of the container within a month of use. My husband kept using the little amount that worked its way out the hole in the bottom! I definitely expect better, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: jillk

customer_reviews.title: Affordable. No white cast.
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smothly, the white cast disappears in seconds. Great price. Does have shininess to it but I will still use it. Non irritating and very moisturizing. I use blotting papers, I hope it doesn’t ruin the efficacy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cream for the past few weeks. I do enjoy using it. At the beginning I used my face cream and applied this over it. However, I found my skin to become super oily. So, I just applied the sunscreen direclty and without using any other cream underneath it. This is not an ideal product if you're planning to work out! I used it couple times and unfortunately the cream started agitating my eyes!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim E.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: The sun is so poisonous and spicy, prevent bask in it is necessary really, go out before gush gush is very relaxed and moist, the mist silk that gush comes out is very exquisite, protect wet effect is very obvious, really very surprise, beautiful white prevent bask in again, flavour is quite faint scent also, besmear goes up can have the effect of beautiful white, but won't false white again.The effect is really good, still can prevent bask in with concealer, after wiping the skin color is very even, very relaxed, not false white, prevent bask in the effect is good, can buy back.
customer_reviews.author: BARBRA LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: My favorite product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product everyday! It is lightweight and doesn't leave a white sunscreen film. I usually put this on every morning and usually do not reapply when I am working. However, when I am outside swimming or gardening, I reapply at least once more. I have sensitive skin, so this has been working out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cindifer

customer_reviews.title: Great life-saver!
customer_reviews.text: Only have to apply once--I spend most of my time outside, at altitude in the West. Finally I've found a sunscreen that smells--or rather does not smell, that feels ok on my skin (I don't feel greasy all day, and bugs don't cling to my face). I can use this daily and my skin does not break out, nor does it feel like the pores are clogged. I have had 4 or so melanomas. The most recent one on my face which gives me a scar on the cheek... With this sunscreen, I feel like i will survive my outdoor life (wearing a hat of course). I use this hiking, backpacking, kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Baker

customer_reviews.title: Very good invisible protection
customer_reviews.text: I was using a heavier cream that takes 3 washings to get off at night, but this protects almost as long (I am very fair and got a little red when I was out on the water boating for 4 hours straight at midday) and is much easier to remove, and to get on without having white smears.
customer_reviews.author: SWA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my maiden sailing trip. I should have purchased sea sick pills. Spent the day leaning over the side of boat. However, i am VERY fair and burn easily. I experienced absolutely NO BURN with Elta. God Bless Them. This product is amazing - at least something went well.
customer_reviews.author: aam

customer_reviews.title: One of the better ones
customer_reviews.text: The Elta MD sunscreen lines are one of the few that doesn't irritate my skin. Unfortunately, it does make it break out on and off. Not anything terrible, but enough to warrant it as just a back-up if I don't have the Vanicream Sunscreen at hand (which I've grown to love more and is equal to this brand, in my opinion).
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: It is very moisturizing! My Skin Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was unsure I liked how moisturizing it was, but honestly it’s helped my skin so much! It’s a little shiny on the face, but I think it’s healthy looking & I do get compliments. It’s helped my dry skin a lot. It’s hard to wear under make up sometimes because it doesn’t always mix well with the other products... but I only notice it because I am obsessed with everything make up. The normal person would probably never notice.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Umana

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily.
customer_reviews.text: Use of Elta sunblock SPF 50 was recommended by my dermatologist. I have a history of squamous cell carcinoma & am also allergic to the sun. (Sounds weird, I know. Itchy rash on arms, legs--not fun) Anyway--she recommended this. Pretty pricey stuff at her office, so I checked on Amazon. Better price (by $8 a bottle!) AND--it works. Easy to apply, absorbs well, and prevents the sun-rash issue. I have tried various name-brand sunblocks from the store, none are as effective as this.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond G. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 68 years old (male), am in the sun a lot, and hate sunscreen which I have refused to wear since I was a kid. I went rafting down the Grand Canyon for 12 days and since I burn easily decided I would have to wear it. This product is phenomenal - I was in intense sun for 12 days, did not burn and barely tanned. Moreover it is not oily - you don’t even feel like you have applied anything. So for people who don’t like sunscreen (and those who do), this is your product!!!
customer_reviews.author: W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Elta MD sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I have very light skin and have been using this sunscreen for over 4 1/2 yrs. I live in FL. and since I have had Mohrs surgery 2 times in Williamsburg, VA. I started using this sunscreen. I have referred 2 friends to this sunscreen. I find it worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Reina

customer_reviews.title: Bottle leaked after taking aboard an airplane
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the whole family. Its true that it's a little greasy but for the protection that's fine by me. The only concern I had was that my bottle started leaking after taking it aboard an airplane. I only made it about half way through when this happened and the pump wouldn't function properly after that.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Super Sensitive Skin🥰
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this line from my friend. I am so happy I bought this even if its a bit pricey bec my skin is super sensitive that I wonder if my legs would break out from a product. Thankfully this product worked for me. This will be my new go-to travel sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Love this sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: my favorite sunscreen. I use it everyday. Very light and doesn't make my face greasy. I have a very sensitive face (I have rosacea) and this doesn't make me flair up or break out
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Benavidez

customer_reviews.title: Works well would not recommend for face
customer_reviews.text: I usually use the tinted face version of this but accidentally got this one. This works well and does the same job. Just a little to oily/greasy for my liking on my face. Excellent UV protection though
customer_reviews.author: KDrake

customer_reviews.title: Good protection but not enough
customer_reviews.text: Has good coverage for going around the city but not if you plan to go to the beach. Great thing that is fragrance free and not sticky yet moisturizing. Overall is a good product
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Great product, excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this version (Sport), is not too thick, and it could easily to apply like other brands. I have very sensitive skin, and I love it! OIL FREE!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. C. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The best athletic sunscreen I've ever come across.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic ! Won't run, won't sting your eyes. Won't clog up your pores. And after you get done with your activity, a quick rinse off in the shower and no sticky mess or residue. It's AMAZING. The best sunscreen I've ever come across for athletics. And the UV protection is top notch. Doesn't attract bugs like many, many other brands. Doesn't really have a smell. I'm so happy with it, I'm willing to buy this stuff over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Toppins

product_meta.title: EltaMD UV Sport Sunscreen Lotion, Broad-Spectrum SPF 50, Non-Greasy, Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, Water-Resistant
product_meta.description:
Size:Sports 3 OunceUV Sport full-body sunscreen is great for use while enjoying all outdoor activities. This mineral-based sunscreen is water-resistant so it won’t rinse off in water or drip into your eyes and sting when you sweat. sensitivity-free and noncomedogenic.

BRAND STORY
EltaMD Skin Care is committed to helping you have great skin for life. Our company has developed sunscreen, skin care products and wound healing products trusted by physicians for more than 25 years.
